website_summaries.verdict: Perfect backpack for versatility, as lower pocket is large enough for a soccer ball.
pros: Contains 1 interior zippered pocket and 3 exterior pockets
Upper compartment has vented material and is made for storing shoes, allowing air to flow
Includes specific storage area for laptop or tablet
cons: Design may be too narrow for the gear some people need to carry

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room for adult shoes.
customer_reviews.text: More than enough room for adult shoes. I wear a size 9.0 men's shoe (U.S.) and there is plenty of room for my gym shoes in the top pocket AND the bottom area as well. I was worried that maybe this was more of a kid size backpack but it is perfect for adult size shoes, shorts, shirts, water bottle, etc. I am very pleased with it and it's a great price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy D

customer_reviews.title: So much room for gear.
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious and durable material. I coach youth soccer, this holds my son's size 4 ball, cleats, shin guards, keeper gloves, my clip board, team notebook and so has room to spare! If I have any concern, the dividing material inside is a pretty thin liner material, not sure how long before it'll start to tear, but 4 or 5 months now and so far so good, so 5 big stars!
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this bag is spacious as hell. That's one thing I bought it for and I didn't expect it to be that much. I thought the reviews were exaggerated but they're not. I love the colour and simplicity of the bag. I'm an avid football player that's also why I bought the bag so it would be used everytime I go to training and matches. I would upload pictures of the pockets soon.👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: O'Sean Nedd

customer_reviews.title: Your kid will love this bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for my 10year old travel soccer player and (per him and his father) will fit him theough high school. It is larger than other addidas bags that could be bought through the club. The lower pocket fits a size 5 ball no problem. The inside is bright green so his stuff doesn't disappear. The cleat pocket is fabulous. This bag fits both of his uniforms, his shoes, water, ball, warm up clothes, small pump, extra shoes. And a book.
customer_reviews.author: 3 boys

customer_reviews.title: *Best Soccer Bag*
customer_reviews.text: After twenty something years of adult soccer, this is by far the best bag I've ever owned. Perfect number of slots to stick various things, stinky stuff goes in a specific stinky pouch which doesnt affect the rest of the bag as much (still does, but not as much). Small pouch perfect for a set of cones or other various med kit stuff. Just really love this soccer bag.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Ball pocket fits a size 5 ball. Shoe pocket is big, can fit my size 11.5 shoes and shin guards and still has room for a bit more. I've fit up to five jerseys in the main pocket. Does get packed trying to add sweats. Problem with this bag is when you have your ball in the bag it doesn't stay upright, just falls over. And the biggest flaw with this bag is the water bottle pockets. The pockets are slanted backwards, so when your bag falls over your bottles fall out. Really annoying. But overall the pros outweigh the cons. I'm glad I bought this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Paulino

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my soccer loving 9 year old. It is a nice color of orange, easily visible among many packs. It holds all gear and drinks with room to spare and fits well on the back of my slender son. Has been carried on multiple sleepovers and overall has lasted nicely.
customer_reviews.author: AMH

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag as described.
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my 8-year old son. So far so good. Durable, nice color, love the inside high vis material. They could improve the zippers with YKK, but otherwise, this bag seems ready to spend a few years taking a beating.
customer_reviews.author: nyfitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great Soccer backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great Soccer backpack. I bought it for my daughter and she loves it. Holds her ball, cleats, shin guards, socks, spare gear etc and water bottles without an issue. We really like the separate compartments for the ball, shoes etc, rest of gear, and sunglasses. Not overly big, so it fits a kid well; but still big enough to hold everything we need, even for full day camps or soccer tournaments. We did look at several other similar packs, but they were either much more expensive, too small, too big, or didn't have the separate compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S

customer_reviews.title: I was a little worried it would be too small ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried it would be too small. The bag is deceiving. It has so much room. I bought 3 of them as Christmas presents for my kids. 2 boys that play soccer year round and my daughter that plays multiple sports and uses this bag for all of them. plenty of room and the "smelly pocket", as we call it, can fit cleats, shinguards, smelly socks and jerseys with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: sid

customer_reviews.title: very good and affordable backpack
customer_reviews.text: very good and affordable backpack. the inside is really nice and as describe by adidas. my only complain would be the water pocket been to small as I got one of those big fat green gatorade water containers and will always fall to the floor by itself but oh well ill just put it inside but for the other parts excellent backpack.
customer_reviews.author: juan pinto

customer_reviews.title: Hoping this one will last longer than the one from last year.
customer_reviews.text: Bought another brand of team backpack last summer for my grandson to use through soccer season. It barely made it through the season. I decided to try Adidas this time and, hopefully, it will make it more than one season. It seems well made and has everything he wants. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Mamma

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and has several useful compartments/pockets with ventilation for keeping ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and has several useful compartments/pockets with ventilation for keeping your shoes, shinguards, ball, clothes separate. Not a TON of extra room once the ball and cleats are loaded in, but keeps everything organized and secure. Appreciate the fleece lining in the phone pocket up top.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Reinke

customer_reviews.title: Soccer kids dream bag!
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this bag! You can fit a ton in it and has a really cool soccer ball pocket. Well worth they money!
customer_reviews.author: Steven James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag comes exactly as pictured, I bought it to use around campus and it’s an awesome bag. I love how lightweight and durable it is. I carry around 30lbs of books and other things in my bag everyday and it’s never showed signs of wear or tears. Definitely something to keep in mind when shopping for your next back pack
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Ripberger

customer_reviews.title: Solid soccer pack. Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Son and he absolutely loves it for his comp soccer. The whole team and every other team seems to all have them. Well made and pockets fit every need for the soccer enthusiast. Solidly built product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: extremer

customer_reviews.title: Great Soccer Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: The adidas stadium team backpack is great, the separate pocket for the cleats are great so on those rainy days your other gear won't get wet. Good amount of room for all your gear too although it does get a little tight with a ball in it. Only complaint is the side mesh pockets for water bottles because they are at an angle and almost every time I set my stuff down they'll fall out of the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compartments make this bag very useful. I was hesitant to buy it but the ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of compartments make this bag very useful. I was hesitant to buy it but the separate containers for shoes, phone, etc. really help my child stay organized for soccer. He can keep his cleats separate from his uniforms or other clean clothing he needs to bring.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is super well made and has been nice and roomy
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is super well made and has been nice and roomy. My one complaint is that my daughter's water bottles do not stay in the side pockets. They fall out on the field, in the car, wherever she lays the pack down. I have tried to take a "tuck" in the elastic, but it is still happening - she is asking for a new pack because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: ... 10 year both play soccer and this bag is great! There is a place for all of your ...
customer_reviews.text: My 8 and 10 year both play soccer and this bag is great! There is a place for all of your soccer essentials (including epipens)
customer_reviews.author: Noname listed

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack though on the small side
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack for my 10 Year old. I had originally bought this for my high schooler but it wasn’t large enough to hold everything. It does easily fit size 4 ball plus some gear. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for soccer
customer_reviews.text: Great soccer backpack. It holds the ball in a separate compartment so if its dirty it won't dirty the clothes in the other compartment. Holds shinguards, spare clothes, water bottles, etc. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rutgers8

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is good
customer_reviews.text: Teenager that plays soccer, wanted this to put all his equipment. all fits with plenty of space even bottle water and he really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: M.Fdez

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for the money for high school soccer players
customer_reviews.text: Bag works great and has held up well. Plenty of room and various pockets to store soccer stuff. If they could invent some kind of pouch in the bag that you could put the shoes in and ziplock it so the whole bag didn't smell like them within a week, I'd pay double.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the peeling
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great soccer bag until the reflection part of the bag started peeling off after having the bag for only 3 months! so disappointed. All the storage is great but walking around with it peeling is not so great
customer_reviews.author: Monica_f4

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter who plays soccer and she loves it. Great bag, no issues after two seasons use, no rips, tears, broken zippers, etc. Would buy again, and probably will for our younger daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Joel S

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my son in law to use for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son in law to use for his frisbee golf equipment. He likes that is has a separate compartment for his cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Warranty sounds great until your product is defective!
customer_reviews.text: Less than 7 months after using this Stadium Bag, the upper zipper broke. The manufacturer, Western Sporting Goods and Agron Inc. (official licensee) wants me to send it back to California (on my dime) and they'll look over the product. If it's deemed to be defective, they'll send a new one in 7-10 days. Be careful - the warranty sounds good until you need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: A good duffle bag would probably do the job better
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bag, but once you put a ball inside, there doesn't leave much room for cleats and other items. A good duffle bag would probably do the job better.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer bag
customer_reviews.text: Great soccer bag. Do not overfill inside compartment before you place ball in ball compartment. Insert ball, then load the rest of your gear. This bag has held up well for the past year. It has survived several washings and is easily embroidered.
customer_reviews.author: Richard I.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.
customer_reviews.text: Does everything you need it to. Bought for an 12 year old. Holds 3 pair of shoes, ball, plus plenty of other stuff. I was most concerned about size, and other reviews had me somewhat optimistic. Bigger than I thought, but not unwieldy. She carries it around fine. Only real knock is the outside side pockets don't look like they hold a water bottle to securely. That and a couple days rings or loops would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: john b zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great Gym Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Everything as described. Good Adidas quality. Nothing more, nothing less. I'm confident that this will last me for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Backpack lasted less about 8 months until a huge tear along the zipper. Expected to get a couple year of use out of it as we have with other brands. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, great color. Used for soccer trainings and games and it’s perfect. Fits a ball and all needed equipment nicely with lots of different compartments.
customer_reviews.author: amazingme

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Soccer Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bag is made very well and has plenty of pockets for a ball, cleats, extra uniforms/clothing, towel, water bottle etc. It fits everything that my 11YO needs for travel soccer. I chose this color because everyone else had navy blue- guess who always found their water and stuff faster than anyone!
customer_reviews.author: LKing

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! It it so much roomier than it looks
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! It it so much roomier than it looks. My son had been using a different back pack for his soccer stuff but he couldn't fit his ball in it and there was no separate compartment for his cleats. This has a separate cleat area so dirty cleats don't have to be packed in with anything else. I also like that the ball has a spot at the bottom of the bag instead of the front so the bag isn't bulky when full. Plenty of room in main section for change of clothes and a mesh pocket for his shin guards. I wish I had gotten this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: Really good size for my 14 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: Really good size for my 14 year old daughter. She's 5'6" and the bag fits her perfect with plenty of room for her soccer gear and water. She doesn't usually carry a soccer ball so I'm not sure if I could make that fit.
customer_reviews.author: JrodBigDog

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice bag. Only issue is that it smells bad ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice bag. Only issue is that it smells bad for while till it airs out. probably took 2-3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my soccer equipment. So far it's been great! I know someone who has also bought this bag, and he has had it for a much longer time and it still works fine! It is bright neon yellow inside which I love. The ball compartment is sturdy, and the bag is well built. I would recommend this bag for ANYONE who plays soccer.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Yi

customer_reviews.title: This bag was perfect for my son's soccer practices/games
customer_reviews.text: This bag was perfect for my son's soccer practices/games. The compartments nicely held his soccer ball and other materials, (e.g. extra clothing, cleats) and because there were multiple zippered compartments I was able to store the cleats separately.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Son loves this bag. My aunt has an embroidery ...
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this bag. My aunt has an embroidery machine and put his name on it for Christmas. He immediately put his soccer gear in it.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my husband who plays soccer, he ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband who plays soccer, he loves it. Uses it every weekend. Durable, we've had it for 7 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: She loved it and uses it every day
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my high school granddaughter. She loved it and uses it every day. Large enough for all her school needs plus sports bottle, etc. Priced lower than other places. I would certainly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Burress

customer_reviews.title: Great size and look, but only lasted one season?
customer_reviews.text: This was a really great bag for the first season! Just perfect with enough room for soccer ball, shoes, clothes, snacks and water. The bummer was that it developed a small tear in the seam that now has frayed and the pack has a large hole.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Lehnen

customer_reviews.title: Got for daughter. She loves it and it fits ...
customer_reviews.text: Got for daughter. She loves it and it fits so many of her school books, plus shoes that she needs for track practice.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son has had this soccer bag for about six weeks and a zipper is already broken. He had his previous soccer bag for five years, so he is not rough on equipment. The return window closed after a month, so we are stuck with a defective product. Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: delivered fast 💨 and nice color blue lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: delivered fast 💨 and nice color blue lots of pockets .and my husband is tall so the bag is a good size it’s a bit bigger then regular back packs
customer_reviews.author: Ashma

customer_reviews.title: Fits gear with no problems
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, it seems well made. I bought this for my 14 yr old son. We loaded the bag with his gear. It fits a size 5 ball in the bottom, size 11 boots in the ventilated area, water bottles on the sides, extra uniform and socks in the center section. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: John i

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!  Did not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it says it is and an excellent way to keep organized for sports. Really great quality and the logo is reflective which is really awesome!
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: works for swimmers too
customer_reviews.text: exceeds my expectations. roomy, yet not bulky. i swim and keep my swim shoes in the front pocket and they are able to dry out until next use. fits a towel, goggles, shoes, and miscellaneous stuff and has nice side pockets for a water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: ETK

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack, it has a place for everything including when you go to the Gym or on Vacation. It even has a small pocket for keys and your IPhone so you don't have to open any of the big zipped pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Team Backpack Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was a Christmas gift to my granddaughter and she loved it. It seemed to be excellent quality and I am sure it will last her a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Fayesruby

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Team loves the bag. Getting numbers put on now. Very functional holds all what they need for 1 game and full day tournaments.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Its alright. My son use every day, only last 6month.
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: This was exactly what we wanted. There is a ...
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we wanted. There is a pocket for the soccer ball and a pocket for cleats as well as a separate pocket for uniforms/clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gill

customer_reviews.title: Good bag!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. I just wish the side pockets where a bit taller, so that those Gatorade bottles don't fall out. At least one side.
customer_reviews.author: dynamok

customer_reviews.title: Good quality packbag! Strong material!
customer_reviews.text: My son love it! He is a very picky teenager, when he open this gift on Christmas he was saying... woo so cool mom, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect - love the cleat zippered section the most. My son complains that it's hard to get a soccer ball in and out of the bag (size 5) but other than that it's already been put to good use.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Mom Win!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly sized for all things soccer. Love the accessibility in the front of the bag and separate shoe/ball/stuff pockets. Well placed front/top zipper access makes it super easy to have last name embroidered (no more hunting in the stash of bags!).
customer_reviews.author: JAR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing all the things this bag can hold
customer_reviews.text: Amazing all the things this bag can hold! I love that my son’s cleats can be separated from his uniform & therefore doesn’t get it dirty.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a soccer season and I loved it. Packed a lot of items and it was still lightweight. The color was cute and I like the area for the ball at the bottom. Cheap price as well.
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Love the cleat and ball section to separate dirty stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the cleat and ball section to separate dirty stuff from the rest. Shoes fit easily and a football slides right in the bottom. There's also a small pocket on the top for wallet/keys/etc. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack. I use it as a gym bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. I use it as a gym bag (it also has a compartment for shoes which is very convenient) I also used it on a trip to Greece. It has a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Antigoni T

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Prefect. Can fit cleats. Soccer ball and multiple changes of clothes. Seems hardy
customer_reviews.author: Barbara DeShon

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for my 11-year-old soccer player.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality bag. Holds a soccer ball, cleats in a separate zipped pocket, plus everything else my daughter needs while traveling to soccer games. We're happy with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for soccer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's soccer - the team ordered the same one through a soccer store, it was cheaper here. Feels like it will last through lots of abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter's gear and water bottles. It keeps everything together during and after the season. I love the rubberized bottom which keeps the wet ground from seeping into the interior. Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Philbyfile

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever
customer_reviews.text: The best bag I own by far. I use it for footgolf and it fits my snacks, water, wallet, keys, cell, ball markers, a pump, shoes and my two soccer balls. Super comfortable to wear all day. I beat my bag up and still looks brand new. Would buy another and probably will.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. I held off on writing a review for this bag until my daughter was able to use the bag for a season of soccer. It's held up to my little wrecking ball. No concerns
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great size.  Versatile use for sports or travel.
customer_reviews.text: Compartments are a perfect size for clothes or gear. I use the separate compartment to keep my post workout sweaty clothes separate from everything else. Works well for enough clothes for a short weekend trip.
customer_reviews.author: Soop

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really fit a #5 ball
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really fit a #5 ball in the pouch that holds the ball. Not sure why they didn't construct the front to be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: mairob

customer_reviews.title: nice fit and finish as well
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding bag....very roomy, nice fit and finish as well. If you are thinking about this bag, just buy it....honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Witt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this soccer bag! Has many great compartments for all your soccer essentials!
customer_reviews.author: Martina N. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: this is a really large bag
customer_reviews.text: this thing is really big, especially for a kid, but it was recommended from the team website. Is a nice soccer-specific bag and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jong Lee

customer_reviews.title: These bags are great. Very durable and a great price
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great. Very durable and a great price. I paid $65 for one at a soccer store. Found these on Amazon for my daughters team and we all love them
customer_reviews.author: Nakia Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is once you put your your equipment there isn’t room for much else.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: It is a backpack! Its nice too!
customer_reviews.text: He had to have the Adidas one. He likey! Was good price. Like it holds the ball. Or he can put his dirty socks in the bag so they can sit there for a week and stink up the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Just some guy.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as a Christmas present. She loves it. Very pretty light pink color, and it's well made. I'm sure she's going to love using it for soccer practice.
customer_reviews.author: ef

customer_reviews.title: Best bag for soccer lovers
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for any soccer player Has enoug room for anything that you might need on your soccer games well constructed bag
customer_reviews.author: 21nineone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it regularly for soccer as well as the "parent things to do" backpack for my kids' activitiesl
customer_reviews.author: Phil D

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Both my boys play travel soccer and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Both my boys play travel soccer and these backpacks are much nicer than the ones we've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Himmelspach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Spacious, fits a spare set of clothes and a ball
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It fits everything that she needs for soccer; shoes, shin guards, clothes, and her ball.
customer_reviews.author: Kena Boles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can fit like 3 pairs of my cleats in here, my ball, and cones in here. Wonderful! :)
customer_reviews.author: Umar Farooq

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for indoor & outdoor soccer, my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelz Millz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds everything a young soccer player needs for games and practice.
customer_reviews.author: R. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for sports
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality backpack. My daughter loves to use it for all of her sports. It holds a lot of stuff! It is water repellent and has a separate area for wet items.
customer_reviews.author: Mar. O

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy and durable. You can fit a soccer ...
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy and durable. You can fit a soccer outfit, cleats, guards and ball, and still have plenty of room for more. wish it had a small pocket for keys and cell.
customer_reviews.author: cristi

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for soccer supplies
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for soccer supplies. Easily holds all you need, and more! Definitely would recommend to anyone needing a nice looking bag that holds all you need for soccer.
customer_reviews.author: Spartysenior

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughter, and she loves them. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compartments really roomy
customer_reviews.text: Love this bad you can get so much into it a weekend's worth of clothing and shoes fit into the overhead
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, ok price
customer_reviews.text: A really great bag, not paid review btw, idk how to do those, but I wish there were a clip that goes across the chest. That would be really useful for running with it.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice roomy bag that fits soccer ball along with clothes,shoes,shin guards,headgear, water bottle....
customer_reviews.author: melissa chambers

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack Durable Keeps everything in place and looks sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag!! Plenty of compartments, and love how the ball isn't exposed like other soccer bags
customer_reviews.author: Darby30

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect backpack and fits a lot of things. I feel like I got a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Asia Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Nice price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Fits all my daughter's soccer gear plus some. The price on Amazon is quite a bit lower than we saw in a couple stores.
customer_reviews.author: Indian89

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Bought two for my daughters and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Bought two for my daughters and the Adidas logo one of them was silver and the other was faint pink (like the blue from the bag bleed through the the silver). Not the sellers fault, more the manufacturer. By itself, the bag doesn't look bad. I would recommend that if seller ships more than one bag, make sure that they match.
customer_reviews.author: MtP Guy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compartments
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this backpack, and a much better price than in a sports store. Keeps you well organized and a place to hide those stinky cleats after a game.
customer_reviews.author: B. R.

customer_reviews.title: This was a good backpack, for the first week or two
customer_reviews.text: This was a good backpack, for the first week or two. I purchased this soccer backpack for my daughter, she loved it. That was until the ball compartment started to rip and fray. Lifetime warranty? Not so much...
customer_reviews.author: bobmarleyluv

product_meta.title: adidas Stadium Team Backpack
product_meta.description: This bag is big enough to fit everything for practice or an away game and loaded with function to cover you for school. the bottom of the bag is made of hydroshield water-resistant material to keep your stuff safe from the field or gym floor. there is a front zippered pocket to keep your dirty cleats or sneakers separated. the bottom zippered pocket holds a regulation size soccer ball so you're game ready.
feature_bullets: Do not bleach. Gently wash by hand. Line dry
Front pocket is built with FreshPAK ventilation for your cleats and sneakers
Hydroshield water-resistant base, extra durable 3d ripstop fabric, and space for your team branding
Interior zipped pocket for the small stuff and zippered bottom ball pocket that can hold a size 5 soccer ball
Ultraride extra padded shoulder straps and backpanel to keep you comfortable
